ComicInfo.Summary:
And now, another unequivocal issue of...GERT IN SPACE! When we last left our struggling starlet, Gertrude was stuck in an infinite fantasy hell-loop of her own making. Meanwhile, Fairyland favorites Larry and Duncan Dragon possess a desperate dream and await a demonic deliverable in their last-ditch effort to clear the skies of an imposing and oppressive darkness. Gertrude may not want to be the heroine Fairyland wants, but for at least one last time, she's apparently stuck being the heroine they are obliged to deserve!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Skottie Young | 1 | B | Uncensored Cover B | Skottie Young | 2 | C | Cover C | Kelly Aaron | 3 |
